name: Arcturus
message: You were my first sunrise after a long night — soft, bright, and impossible to forget. Even galaxies would envy your light, Mikey.

name: Canopus
message: We were chaos and calm at once — arguing, laughing, teasing, and still finding our way back like gravity does to stars.

name: Sirius
message: Your smile still has the power to stop whole constellations. I don’t need a reason to care — I just do, endlessly.

name: Vega
message: You once made even small moments feel infinite — like we were two kids stealing time from the universe and calling it love.

name: Rigel
message: Sometimes I still hear your laugh echoing in my head — loud, wild, full of life. You made ordinary days glow like starlight.

name: Betelgeuse
message: You had that rare energy — a mix of fire and calm. Even when you were angry, I loved that spark. It made you real, Mikey.

name: Altair
message: If love had a rhythm, ours would’ve been laughter in quiet rooms and chaos in public — perfectly offbeat, perfectly us.

name: Aldebaran
message: You taught me that real love isn’t about proving — it’s about feeling. Even now, I carry that peace. Saranghae, my Mikey.

name: Procyon
message: If memories are stars, ours are the ones that never fade — a little wild, a little wrong, but forever shining when I think of you.
